commit.message:
Add regex patterns to OIDC_EXEMPT_URLS setting

Support regex patterns in OIDC_EXEMPT_URLS, to avoid session renewal
for any request path that matches the pattern.

Python 3.7 introduced re.Pattern, the public base class for compiled
patterns. In Python 3.6 and earlier (including Python 2.7), this was
available as _pattern_type.

verification.payload:
tree 8f13922b4df167468036767d0a38e4df45480340

committer John Whitlock <jwhitlock@mozilla.com> 1596210596 -0500

Add regex patterns to OIDC_EXEMPT_URLS setting

Support regex patterns in OIDC_EXEMPT_URLS, to avoid session renewal
for any request path that matches the pattern.

Python 3.7 introduced re.Pattern, the public base class for compiled
patterns. In Python 3.6 and earlier (including Python 2.7), this was
available as _pattern_type.

commit.message:
Fix JWKS handling with same `kid` across JWKs

Prior to this change, when a JWKS was delivered with multiple JWK with
the same `kid` but different `alg` specified, the function would
consider the first key in the list where the `kid` matched.  If the
`alg` didn't match, an exception would be raised and if there was a
valid JWK with the right `alg` (eg later in the list) it would not be
considered.

In the JWK spec (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7517#section-4.4), the
`alg` value isn't required to be unique -- only to match -- so the check
shouldn't raise an exception at this point, but rather continue checking
all remaining JWKs.

With this change, an exception is still raised at the end if no valid
JWK is found.

Refines the change at https://github.com/mozilla/mozilla-django-oidc/commit/decc46f572a59f17bdcb2eade8a1ba37ee1fe7d8

Update urls install config for Django 2.0+

The previous set of docs were constructing `urlpatterns` in Django 1.x style; this changes the docs to reflect docs for Django 2 and above.

verification.payload:
tree d68da9a6b2dd8f06f957d3ad0c3d1ab8feea6231

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1586843154 +0000

Update urls install config for Django 2.0+

The previous set of docs were constructing `urlpatterns` in Django 1.x style; this changes the docs to reflect docs for Django 2 and above.

commit.message: Added configuration options to define a timeout and a proxy for requests to the OpenID Connect provider.

Tweak logout template examples (#321)

* Tweak logout template examples

* Add missing `csrf_token` / `csrf_input`
* Shorten snippets by removing `html`/`body` tags
* Fix Jinja2 example

* Don't call is_authenticated in Jinja2 template

`is_authenticated` is a property in recent Django versions (since 1.10) and can not be called since the release of Django 2.0
Keep title levels consistent between README and HISTORY rst
Fix RST issues so PyPI can render long description.
Bump version: 1.2.2 → 1.2.3
Update HISTORY for new release
